src:
Gangguan Internet, Ini Penjelasan dari Telkomsel
05 Nov 2019, 12:44 by Mosita Dwi Septiasputri


Gangguan Internet, Ini Penjelasan dari Telkomsel

KBRN, Jakarta : Tagar Telkomsel menjadi trending topic nomor 1 di Twitter dengan jumlah cuitan 37 ribu, sebagian netizen di Twitter mengeluhkan permasalahan gangguan layanan paket data tersebut ke akun Twitter resmi @Telkomsel pada Selasa (5/11/2019)."Indihome, Telkomsel gangguan. Instagram, browser, WhatsApp gangguan juga nggak bisa diakses," cuit salah satu netizen di Twitter.Telkomsel pun menjelaskan bahwa saat ini sedang ada kendala dan peningkatan sistem Telkomsel. Sampai saat ini, Telkomsel terus memberikan perbaikan untuk para pengguna providernya."Maaf banget ya buat kendala enggak bisa akses internetnya, saat ini sedang ada peningkatan di sistem Telkomsel dan masih dalam proses perbaikan, diupayakan secepatnya normal kembali. Terima kasih untuk tetap setia menggunakan produk Telkomsel," cuit salah satu customer service di akun resmi Twitter.Menurut VP Corporate Communications Telkomsel, Denny Abidin mengatakan yang error hanya sistem layanan paket data saja, untuk layanan voice dan SMS normal."Kami menyampaikan permohonan maaf atas ketidaknyamanan yang terjadi. Tetapi layanan voice dan SMS tetap normal," tutupnya.
text:
Internet Disruption, This Explanation from Telkomsel
05 Nov 2019, 12:44 by Mosita Dwi Septiasputri


Internet Disruption, This Explanation from Telkomsel

KBRN, Jakarta: Telkomsel has become the number 1 trending topic on Twitter with 37 thousand tweets, some netizens on Twitter complained about the problem of interrupting the data packet service to the official Twitter account @ Telkomsel on Tuesday (11/05/2019). "Indihome, Telkomsel interference. Instagram, browser, WhatsApp interruptions also can not be accessed, "tweeted one netizen on Twitter. Telkomsel also explained that there are currently obstacles and improvements to the Telkomsel system. Until now, Telkomsel continues to provide improvements to the users of its providers. "I'm really sorry for the constraints of not being able to access the internet, currently there is an improvement in the Telkomsel system and it is still in the process of being repaired, as soon as possible to be normal again. Thank you for staying loyal to use the product Telkomsel, "tweeted one of the customer services on the official Twitter account. According to Telkomsel Corporate Communications VP, Denny Abidin said that the error was only the data packet service system, for normal voice and SMS services." We express our apologies for the inconvenience that occurred. But the service voice and SMS remain normal, "he concluded.
